name: Kaetram
description:
Kaetram is an experimental 2D HTML5 open-source game project. There are no plans for this project as of currently. Feel free to explore the world and give your opinions on it thus far. 

If you are interested in keeping up with the development, check out my GitHub and Discord:

https://github.com/Veradictus/Kaetram-Open

https://discord.gg/MmbGAaw
